Title: What Would Lucifer Do?
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Tom Kapinos (developed by), Jason Ning, Mike Costa (executive story editor), Chris Rafferty (executive story editor), Julia Fontana (story editor)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, Tricia Helfer
Plot: Lucifer and Chloe investigate the murder of a youth counselor.
